name: A trip to Tuscany is never perfect without an authentic local meal from the "mama's kitchen"!!
description: Put aside your guide books for a while, and go with the locals!  I will amaze you with the most hidden dinning gems in the area; unique environment full of character; unpretentious atmosphere; friendly people; warm service; authentic recipes passed down from generations; vigorously selected ingredients, great selection of wines, impeccable food that is "fatta al mano by the mama" (home made by the great chef called "mama"), all of these in great value!  If this sounds like something that you dream of while in Tuscany, then I assure you that you will not be let down!
